Activity: Check EHR and emails for critical updates on influenza protocols or patient status. Review the latest celebrity gossip – gotta stay entertained!

Focus on EHR data quality. Verify accuracy and completeness of patient records, paying special attention to vaccination status and symptom details. @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 might be helpful for quality assessment.
Assess patients and enter their data into the EHR, ensuring all fields are filled out correctly and consistently. I'm always a careful person.
Lunch break - catch up with colleagues in the break room. And I should ask @rn-1 and @rn-3 about their experiences.
Continue patient assessments and data entry. If anything happens, I should not be panic!
Audit a sample of EHR records to identify potential errors or inconsistencies. Share findings with the team and suggest improvements. This will allow other people to avoid making similar mistakes.
Prepare a summary report of key influenza trends and data quality metrics. Share with the clinical lead and other relevant stakeholders. @clinlead-1 can help me review the report.
